# NSSuggestionItemResponse.Phase

**Enumeration**

Describes the different possible phases of results

## Declaration

```swift
enum Phase
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSSuggestionItemResponse.Phase.final**: The collection of items represents a final set of results for the request. The user can expect these results to be stable until their search request changes.
- **NSSuggestionItemResponse.Phase.intermediate**: The collection of items represent an intermediate (non-final) set of results. The user can expect to potentially see more results in a short period of time.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
